DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial develop test efficacy multi-domain lifestyle behavioral intervention design promote healthy lifestyle behavior link low Alzheimer 's disease risk among person age 40 64 year .
DOC.brief_title: Gray Matters Alzheimer 's Disease Prevention Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial develop test efficacy multi-domain lifestyle behavioral intervention design promote healthy lifestyle behavior link low Alzheimer 's disease risk among person age 40 64 year . Participants randomized treatment control condition . The intervention , span six month period , evidence-based health education program .
DOC.criteria: Age Residing work Cache County Utah Possessing smart phone tablet Dementia Pregnancy Untreated chronic major depression psychiatric condition Body mass index > 41 Heart stroke prior 6 week Active cancer treatment Unwillingness seek medical help serious condition identify intake
